document_data.name: Merchant House
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/The Good, the Undead, and the Ugly|10}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Merchant House''' was a trade outpost in the town of [[Mossbridges]] run by the [[Company of the Ravens]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Services: The Merchant House run trade in Mossbridges, doing business with local producers and businesses, including purchasing goods from local trappers, [[Borin]], [[Golin]], and [[Chad (trapper)|Chad]], as well as doing business with exotic [[spice]] dealers, such as [[Silas Billmore]] of [[Mulmaster]].
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Company of the Ravens was still establishing itself in [[the Vast]] and figuring out its overall organization, leaning the Merchant House to run itself and the Mossbridges trade. Occasionally, the Merchant House gave shelter and contact to adventurers of the [[Living City]], who were affiliated with the Company of the Ravens.
